messages.content: Are you available next week?
I am not available next week.
Who is your admin?
She's on vacation.
I was thinking to connect our admins with each other to find an opening. What do you think?
I will have to look into that.
We  are presenting at CES after next week.
We will be there.
What are you presenting ?
This requires an NDA.
Does your team have dinner plans while at CES?
we have plans every day. Including lunch. I will let you know if anything changes.
My boss is open funding a large dinner later in the week. Would that be of interest ?
That might be agreeable.
Are you aware of our Learning Maven's AI offering?
No.
Did you see the slide deck I just sent you?
No.
Have you worked with LearningMaven's previously?
No.
